#summary Read this first!
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

Download the source code and run the script demo.m.

You will need {{{MATLAB R2008a}}} or later, and in order to make full use of the current version, you will also need the {{{Image Processing Toolbox}}} and the {{{Genetic Algorithm and Direct Search (GADS) Toolbox}}}.  

=== Next Steps ===

The framework comes with a few default examples of components that can be selected by editing tommasConfig.m.  In addition, you can [http://code.google.com/p/functionalnavigation/downloads/list download components] created by others to demonstrate more system configurations.
